name: pouchdb-fauxton
description: Runs Fauxton on top of PouchDB

scripts.build-firefox: browserify lib/index-firefox-addon.js -o fauxton/js/pouchdb-offline.js && npm run build-injected
scripts.build-chrome: browserify lib/index-chrome-extension.js -o fauxton/js/pouchdb-offline.js && npm run build-injected && npm run build-postmessagerpc
